name: dist_to_onshore_petroleum_v12
title: Distance to On-shore Petroleum
description: Distance to on-shore petroleum, measured in meters. Derived from PRIO global on-shore petroleum dataset.

extract_types_info.mean: average distance per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.max: maximum distance per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.min: minimum distance per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.count: total count of pixels per unit of analysis

extras.citation: Lujala, Päivi; Jan Ketil Rød & Nadia Thieme, 2007. ‘Fighting over Oil: Introducing A New Dataset’, Conflict Management and Peace Science 24(3), 239-256.
